DeathNote

Description : -
"Death Note" is a psychological thriller anime that follows the story of Light Yagami, a high school student who gains possession of a mysterious notebook capable of causing death to anyone whose name is written in it. Driven by a desire to rid the world of criminals, Light takes on the role of a self-styled justice figure. The anime explores complex moral and ethical dilemmas as Light faces off against the enigmatic detective known as L. "Death Note" is praised for its intense cat-and-mouse game, thought-provoking themes, and suspenseful storytelling, making it a standout in the psychological thriller genre.
